subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: With typically tough defense and a balanced offense, the No. 5 Hoyas raced out to a big lead last night and were never challenged in a 74-52 victory against the visiting Wolverines.
snippet: With typically tough defense and a balanced offense, the No. 5 Hoyas raced out to a big lead last night and were never challenged in a 74-52 victory against the visiting Wolverines.
